20110103170735.000|20110103170737.000|CC1|COLLEGE STUDENTS WHICH I DID NOT

20110103170739.000|20110103170742.000|CC1|HOW DO THESE SCAMS WORK.        
20110103170742.000|20110103170745.000|CC1|>> WE KNOW THAT COLLEGE TUITION 
20110103170745.000|20110103170746.000|CC1|RATES HAVE JUST BEEN            
20110103170746.000|20110103170748.000|CC1|SKYROCKETING SO PEOPLE HAVE BEEN
20110103170748.000|20110103170750.000|CC1|LOOKING FOR SCHOLARSHIP DOLLARS.
20110103170750.000|20110103170753.000|CC1|SO PEOPLE SAY YOU CAN PAY US FOR
20110103170753.000|20110103170754.000|CC1|A LIST OF SCHOLARSHIPS AND WE'LL
20110103170754.000|20110103170756.000|CC1|GIVE YOU GOOD LEADS.            
20110103170756.000|20110103170757.000|CC1|A SCHOLARSHIP IS SUPPOSED TO    
20110103170757.000|20110103170759.000|CC1|GIVE YOU MONEY NOT THE OTHER WAY
20110103170759.000|20110103170759.000|CC1|AROUND.                         
20110103170759.000|20110103170801.000|CC1|SO ANY TIME ANYONE'S ASKING YOU 
20110103170801.000|20110103170803.000|CC1|FOR A CHECK OR A CREDIT CARD    
20110103170803.000|20110103170804.000|CC1|NUMBER BEFORE THEY PROVIDE YOU  
20110103170804.000|20110103170807.000|CC1|WITH INFORMATION, THAT'S A      
20110103170807.000|20110103170809.000|CC1|REALLY SURE SIGN THAT YOU HAVE  
20110103170809.000|20110103170809.000|CC1|TO BE CAREFUL.                  
20110103170809.000|20110103170810.000|CC1|>> ESPECIALLY IF THEY USE THE   
20110103170810.000|20110103170813.000|CC1|WORD LIKE GUARANTEED            
20110103170813.000|20110103170814.000|CC1|SCHOLARSHIPS, INFORMATION THAT  
20110103170814.000|20110103170816.000|CC1|YOU CAN'T PROVIDE FROM ANYWHERE 
20110103170816.000|20110103170818.000|CC1|ELSE, OR I JUST NEED YOUR CREDIT
20110103170818.000|20110103170820.000|CC1|CARD NUMBER SO I CAN HOLD THIS
